question: Which of the following has retained as the best selling PV model tag in 2017-18?
explanation: Maruti Suzuki India's entry-level hatchback Alto has retained its status as the best selling passenger vehicle in India in 2017-18. The Alto retained its number one position by selling 258,539 units in 2017-18 as against 241,635 units in the previous financial year. Maruti continued its dominance with seven of its models featuring in the top ten list.
